name: Bomb Disaster!
description:
I highly suggest you to play downloadable version to avoid input lag!

A simple yet addictive Kaboom! variation. This project was made for the 40th anniversary of original game in less than 24 hours of pure worktime. 

Mad Bomber strikes again!
Use water buckets to catch all falling bombs before they reach the ground!

Controls:
Move buckets: A / D or Left / Right
Start the wave: Spacebar
